actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to provide indemnity payments to farmers whose crops are destroyed in whole or in part by certain wildlife.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to make indemnity payments to farmers whose crops are destroyed in whole or in part by specified wildlife. Authorizes necessary appropriations to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide indemnity payments to farmers whose crops are destroyed in whole or in part by certain wildlife.
